title: cafter
author: cafter
content: Kis kis ko chai ke sath roti khana pasand hai? Abhi india me saade 4 baje hai toh chai ke sath roti kha raha tha to ye saval aaya man me. Mujhe roti aur biscuit pasand hai, biscuit = Parle G- G maane genius.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Eh Roti is so unclassy to be eaten with chai.Biscuit all the way with chai. Though I am a coffee guy in most cases.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Both are okay for me but I prefer Biscuit and that to ParleG. I prefer paratha over roti.

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: I like biscuits and puri only

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Prefer biscuit too, but sometimes you want to change things up so then I go with toast or just different biscuit variety. Shree Shree biscuits were favorites for a while then got fed upÂ  Roti if available but for personal reasons I can't so ^

comments.author: Ravichnadra
comments.body: Hahah Kounsa question hai a Chai ke sath biscuit ya roti ??Legends chunte hai chai and sutta

comments.author: yanefek
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 17, 2023, 11:10:53 AMKis kis ko chai ke sath roti khana pasand hai? Abhi india me saade 4 baje hai toh chai ke sath roti kha raha tha to ye saval aaya man me. Mujhe roti aur biscuit pasand hai, biscuit = Parle G- G maane genius.Chai ke Sath biscuit yeh Mera manna he, but for taste roti acchi lagti he.

comments.body: I hope biscuits because bread is good with milk and tea better with toast biscuit in tea stall ðŸ˜œ
